name: Go and Come Back
description:
A historical fiction game that explores memories around the Sri Lankan civil war. A game about remembering names, designed by someone who is bad at remembering games... so the difficulty might be a bit too low right now (especially after I toned it down).

NOTE: Please don't use the space bar to continue / skip dialogue... use the enter key instead. There is a graphical bug related to this... and in order to avoid it, you shouldn't use the spacebar. I'm not patching until after I get feedback / grades for the sake of integrity.

CONTENT WARNING: Islamophobia, Racism, Riot-related violence

It is a bit of a longer submission for the project game jam, but nevertheless I hope you enjoy it. It is more of a draft of a larger idea I have.
